name: Sibu Cable Jumper, Olive
desc: Our comfortable jumper is constructed from a soft-to-touch wool-blend and features a regular ribbed crew-neck, a decorative cable-knit and ribbed edges.A UK 6-8 can expect a relaxed fit, where as a UK 12 will wear more fitted.

name: Yuna Raglan Jumper, Cloud
desc: Super soft cropped tee with short sleeves and a crew neck. A UK 6 - 8 can expect a relaxed fit whilst a UK 10 will wear more fitted..

name: Cropped Rugby Tee, Ivory/Beige
desc: Boxy cut, cropped rugby shirt with a mandarin collar and hidden half button down fastening. With dropped shoulder sleeves, a UK size 6 - 8 can expect a slouchy silhouette whilst a UK size 12 will wear more fitted.

name: Dandelion Embroidered Tee, White
desc: Boxy fit cotton tee with a crew neck and embroidered dandelions all over. A UK size 6 - 8 can expect a slouchy fit whilst a UK size 12 will wear more fitted.

name: Menswear | Oversized Boxy Tee, Black
desc: Half-sleeve lightweight t-shirt made from silky cotton.

name: Menswear | Long Sleeve Boxy Tee, Caramel
desc: A casual 100% cotton long sleeved tee characterised by its scoop neck and detailed stitching..

name: Menswear | Corduroy Shirt, Black
desc: Heavyweight corduroy shirt with a flap pocket, faux pearl corozo buttons, a structured collar, and buttoned cuffs.

name: Menswear | Faux Leather Blouson, Brown
desc: Structured faux leather jacket complete with an open collar, side pockets, a central metal zipper, and popper buttoned cuffs.
